GLOBAL.5: Can't you see that I'm busy?

D1.N0M: I don't want any trouble. I'm just resting, I'll be on my way soon
D1.N1M: My name is Asgar, I am headed to the capital.
D1.N5M: Tell you what, if you can find me a mount I will pay you 50 golds
D1.N2M: I'm afraid not, it would surely help me on my journey
D1.N4M: As you can see for yourself, it is not lit
D1.E5M: The capital? It's still a long journey from here
D1.E6M: Are you going to start a revolution?
D1.E7M: Oh, the capital. I know everything about it. They call me the biggest expert of capitals around here
D1.E1M: Don't you have an horse or something?
D1.E8M: Well, walking is better anyway, it's good for your legs. Expecially walking with an armor on
D1.E9M: How much are you willing to pay for a mean of transport?
D1.E10M: Oh well, sucks to be you
D1.E4M: Do you have a permit for that bonfire, sir?

D2.N0M: Greeting, what are you looking for?
D2.N2M: You mean the old Jack? He wouldn't hurt a fly
D2.N3M: I am not selling them, sorry
D2.E0M: Do you have any work for me?
D2.E1M: Please hide me, a big giant is coming to get me!
